Description: Beautiful, spacious first floor apartment in a convenient part of Brighton. It is gleaming hardwood floors throughout & modern appliances. The main entrance opens from a small mudroom into a large open living room. The dining room is next & central to the apartment. Off to the left are the two bedrooms & bath, the right is the kitchen. Free laundry in the basement, no coin op. Also a large common backyard area with plenty of space to grill, socialize or relax. Lots of free residential parking all around but if a spot is needed for rent, it's $100
